segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall off that stool, and she’s not doing anything to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and no one is guiding her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how disconnected she is from what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she wakes up and sees what’s going on before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most frustrating things I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
